description: This file declares functions related to managing an OVSDB socket connection, including connect, write, listen, and disconnect operations. It serves as an interface for communication over a socket in the OvsDbApi module.

methods.name: ovsdb_socket_connect
methods.description: Establishes a connection to the OVSDB socket.

methods.name: ovsdb_socket_write
methods.description: Writes data to the OVSDB socket.

methods.name: ovsdb_socket_listen
methods.description: Listens for data on the OVSDB socket with a specified timeout.
